welcome_message_body: "Welcome to beautiful Upper Makefield, where small-town charm meets scenic landscapes. Known for its historic landmarks and stunning countryside, we invite you to explore and embrace the unique experiences this city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Trenton Mercer Airport handles all commercial flights and services.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Trenton Mercer Airport handles all private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Doylestown Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Doylestown Airport is exclusively for private flights and offers VIP services.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free wifi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Willow Grove NAS Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Willow Grove NAS Airport, primarily used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal is used for domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal is used for international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Wings Field Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: For private jet travelers, the private terminal at Wings Field Airport provides a luxurious and exclusive experience.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport terminals.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Upper Bucks Airport handles all commercial flights and provides a variety of amenities for passengers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Upper Bucks Airport caters to private and charter flights, offering exclusive services for high-end travelers.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for a limited time during their stay.
